about.name: Pi Alliance
about.description_short: Alliance of Raspberry Pi and ARM based Stake Pools.
about.description_long: The Pi alliance was formed in efforts to build a community of decentralized, low-cost, and energy-efficient stake pool operations on Cardano. All Stake Pools that are apart of this alliance use Raspberry Pis exclusively or low power consuming ARM-based machines.
about.url_png_icon_64x64: http(s) url to pool icon; not animated; max 40kb
about.url_png_logo: http(s) url to pool logo; not animated; max 50kb
